popt4jlib.LocalSearch

Class IntSetN1AllMovesMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • popt4jlib.LocalSearch.IntSetN1AllMovesMaker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AllChromosomeMakerIntf

    public class IntSetN1AllMovesMaker
extends java.lang.Object
implements AllChromosomeMakerIntf
    the class implements the notion of the N_1 neighborhood of a set of integers. In particular, given a subset S of the set M={1,2,...n}, the N_1(S) is the set whose members are the subsets S_i of S with cardinality ||S||-1 as well as the supersets S_i of S with cardinality ||S||+1 that are still subsets of M.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:
